page_visual_description: The page is primarily textual with a focus on procedural instructions for the removal and installation of the steering column and orbital valve. It includes two diagrams labeled as figures, showing detailed parts and their positions. The layout is structured with numbered steps and callouts in the diagrams for clarity. The page is divided into sections with bold headers, and there are no tables present. Visual emphasis is provided through the use of bold text for warnings and important notes.

content_elements.title: Steering Column and Orbital Valve Removal Instructions
content_elements.summary: Detailed procedural steps for safely removing the steering column and orbital valve, including safety precautions and necessary tools.
warnings: Ensure system fluids are cool before proceeding.
